name: Escape Maze (Windows build) by Tiffany
description:
We are Team TWWT(WenYue and me)! This is a game about exploring a maze inwards, escaping from cute monsters, opening mysterious crates and looking for the final treasure. 

Here is the URL to our team GitHub repository and our design journal:

https://github.com/Liu-WenYue/Cart315_TeamProject_IterativePrototypes 

https://github.com/Liu-WenYue/Cart315_TeamProject_IterativePrototypes/wiki 

Task Distribution:

Team:

-Game conceptualization and design

-Discussion and further re-adjustments after playtests

WenYue:

-Maze models (done in Blender)

-UI Design and Minimap (assets were created in Adobe Illustrator)

-Instruction Animation (assets were created in Adobe Illustrator and animation was done in Adobe After Effects)

Tiffany:

-Player controls and assets implementations (codes) including interaction, function and sound feedback

-Enemy AI and navmesh implementation

-Personalized background music themes for each scene

References:

Codes:

Most of our codes came with the help of using unity forums to find answers to our problems. 

Here are some links that we had looked at for some coding help. 

Restart button: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=01sd0VEew7A

Pickup: 

Unity Inventory Tutorial : Pickup on Keypress & Trigger - YouTube

Background music:

Self-composed and self-produced by Tiffany. Inspiration from fantasy and horror games such as Trine as well as from any fantasy bgms on Youtube.
